text.emotional: First, I was hit with freshly harvested vegetables. Tomatoes, carrots, beets, potatoes - they still emitted that earthy scent of fresh soil.
text.silence: {.} first {....} i was hit with freshly harvested vegetables {....} tomatoes {..} carrots beets {..} potatoes {....} they still emitted that {...} earthy scent of fresh soil {...}
